description.author: Salesforce
text: A custom Salesforce Design System (SDS) based tooltip button component that can display a tooltip or a popover with content when interacted with. It can be configured with different placements, symbols, labels, sizes, and variants.

elements.name: tooltipWrapper
elements.description: Represents the tooltip wrapper when the popoverType is 'tooltip'.

elements.name: popoverWrapper
elements.description: Represents the popover wrapper when the popoverType is 'popover'.

elements.name: buttonIcon
elements.description: Represents the button icon that triggers the tooltip or popover.

elements.name: tooltipContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the tooltip.

elements.name: popoverHeaderStartContent
elements.description: Represents the start slot for the popover header.

elements.name: popoverHeaderContent
elements.description: Represents the main slot for the popover header.

elements.name: popoverHeaderEndContent
elements.description: Represents the end slot for the popover header.

elements.name: popoverBodyContent
elements.description: Represents the main content slot for the popover.

elements.name: popoverFooterContent
elements.description: Represents the footer slot for the popover.

text: Checks if the tooltip is visible
Checks if the popover is visible
